example.eg: Even though it was early morning, Emily felt alert and energetic.
example.egtrans: 即使是清晨，艾米丽也觉得毫无睡意、精力充沛。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 醒着的, 毫无睡意的

example.eg: The city issued an alert about the high bacteria content of the drinking water.
example.egtrans: 该市发布了警报，提醒饮用水细菌含量过高。

example.eg: When Chelsea heard the tornado alert, she took her kids to the basement.
example.egtrans: 切尔西听到龙卷风警报声时，就把她的孩子带到了地下室。

example.eg: During the tornado alert, the children were frightened, and some even cried.
example.egtrans: 在龙卷风警报期间，孩子们很害怕，有的甚至哭了起来。

example.eg: If anything changes, please alert your supervisor immediately.
example.egtrans: 如果有任何变化，请立即告知你的导师。

example.eg: Milo's boss alerted him to the change in policy.
example.egtrans: 米洛的老板提醒他注意政策变化。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 警告某人注意某事, 提醒某人注意某事

example.eg: Police are on the alert after two incidents involving an armed robber in the downtown Chicago area.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 警惕, 警觉, 防备

example.eg: We've all been on red alert since the last attack.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 紧急警报, 紧急戒备
剧透警告, 剧透慎入
